data.title: TOP VCH Hotel Wartburg Stuttgart
data.meta_description: TOP INTERNATIONAL Hotels & Corporate Partners,  Hotelcooperation, Hotel booking and reservations online.
data.text:
Lange Strasse 49

DE-70174 Stuttgart

Phone: +49 (0) 711 2045 0

Fax: +49 (0) 711 2045 450

Details

The 3-star TOP VCH Hotel Wartburg is centrally located in Stuttgart and has 74 comfortably furnished non-smoking rooms. At the TOP VCH Hotel Wartburg, you can expect free WiFi and a rich breakfast buffet, as well as a lobby bar, two meeting rooms and a 24-hour reception. For guests arriving by car, the hotel provides limited privat parking spaces for EUR 15,00 per night.

Restaurant

Enjoy your start into the day in the breakfast restaurant and help yourself to the rich breakfast buffet as you wish.

Room Amenities

The 3 star TOP VCH Hotel Wartburg has 74 non-smoking rooms; all equipped with free WiFi, flat-screen cable TV, full size mirror, desk with lamp and chair, private bathroom with shower or bathtub, WC, hairdryer, make-up mirror and razor electrical socket. Non-allergenic bed linen available on request.

Meetings

The hotel offer two air-conditioned event rooms with 22 sqm and 90 sqm. Both rooms have natural daylight, free WiFi, can be blacked-out and are equipped with modern conference technology.

PLAN MEETING

Location

3*** star TOP VCH Hotel Wartburg Stuttgart, a centrally located hotel in the heart of the city. The most sightseeing hot spots are The 3 star TOP VCH Hotel Wartburg Stuttgart, a centrally located hotel in the heart of the city. Public transportation facilities with direct access to the airport, the main station and the exhibition area are in the next surrounding. Distance to S-Bahn/U-Bahn Station Rotebuehlplatz (Stadtmitte) 250 metres, Main station Stuttgart 1.1 km or 1 metro stop, main shopping street Koenigstrasse 10 minutes walking distance.

Points of interest: Altes Schauspielhaus 1km; Staatsgalerie 1.6km; Staatstheater 2km; Carl Zeiss Planetarium 2km; Zoo - Wilhelmina 5km.
